item.title: Prometheus Exporters for fly.io and Vultr
item.description: I’ve been on a roll building utilities this week. I developed a Service Health dashboard for my “thing”, a Prometheus Exporter for Fly.io and today, a Prometheus Exporter for Vultr. This is motivated by the fear that I will forget a deployed Cloud resource and incur a horrible bill. I’ve no written several Prometheus Exporters for cloud platforms: Prometheus Exporter for GCP Prometheus Exporter for Linode Prometheus Exporter for Fly.
